name: TheRoastGods
0:
”Alexa, open the roast gods”
”Alexa, start the roast gods”
”Alexa, ask the roast gods for a burn”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the roast gods
des: If you want to sit in your room alone, cry tears of laughter, or tears from your childhood trauma, these are the roast for you! Entertain yourself or a group of friends with these witty-Savage Roast.... if you dare! When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, open the roast Gods" to move to the next burn. At any point, you can beg for mercy by saying "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
